document.full_text: actor ashton kutcher is joining a revamped version of the top-rated tv comedy "two and a half men", cbs said on friday, ending months of disarray after the acrimonious firing of wayward star charlie sheen.
document.title: sheen bitter, cryer "jazzed" as kutcher joins "men"
lines_and_colors: actor ashton kutcher is joining a revamped version of the top-rated tv comedy "two and a half men", cbs said on friday, ending months of disarray after the acrimonious firing of wayward star charlie sheen.
